data.meta_description: Book the acora Leipzig Living the City in Leipzig Großzschocher directly online ✓ best price guarantee ✓ free WiFi ✓ cheap - book now!
data.text:
acora Leipzig Living the City -

Your hotel in Leipzig Großzschocher

If you are in Leipzig for a few days, it is pleasant to be able to rely on a certain level of comfort. The acora Leipzig Living the City is a non-smoking hotel which, thanks to its apartments with their own kitchenette, is just as suitable for short trips as for a long-term stay, for business guests as well as for families with children.

A lobby with a sitting area, newspapers and a guest magazine, the 24/7 occupied reception, where you can also get information about Leipzig and the surrounding area, and daily room cleaning promise service and comfort like in a hotel. Your own kitchen offers you that kind of freedom that you could usually only enjoy in a holiday apartment: buy your own food and prepare your own meals or hot drinks at a reasonable price and just as you like. This is particularly easy at the acora Leipzig Living the City: The hotel building is part of the "Südwest Zentrum" (Southwest Center), where there is a supermarket, gastronomic localities and many other stores.

In addition to the included internet connection via WiFi, you can also use our public internet terminal. You can park your car in the underground garage for a fee.

All 113 rooms - with a total of 197 beds - are non-smoking rooms with an area of at least 26 m². They offer a small kitchen with a refrigerator, hotplates, a kettle, coffee maker and some rooms include a microwave. All rooms have soundproof windows that can be opened, cable TV, an additional seating area and a bathroom with shower or bathtub and a hairdryer.
